It provides an integral, inter-disciplinary education – a unique intersection between theory and practice, passion and reason.

College_Name: Malabar Christian College- [MCC], Calicut
College_Summary: Malabar Christian College was established in 1901 and is one of the oldest colleges in South India. It is affiliated with the University of Calicut and is managed by the Church of South India (CSI) diocese of Malabar. The college is recognised by the UGC under 2(f) & 12B. Malabar Christian College was also accreditated grade ‘A’ with 3.30 CGPA by the NAAC.

College_Name: MES College
College_Summary: M.E.S College, Marampally is a government-aided college in Aluva, Kerala, established in the year 1995. MES College Marampally offers 17 undergraduate programs and 9 postgraduate programs. Admission to all the courses is done on the basis of merit as well as on personal interviews. Applicants are required to apply offline for the admission process. Graduates from the college are placed in top-notch companies such as Infosys, Wipro, HDFC Bank, etc. The Career and Placement Cell organizes several soft skill training programs, orientation programs, placement drives, recruitment drives, and career talk programs throughout the year.

College_Name: Christian College Kattakada, Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: Christian College, Kattakada is a Science and Arts College, under the Society for Education of the SIUC community. The college offers various undergraduate courses in Physics, Mathematics, Botany, Chemistry and statistics.

College_Name: College of Applied Science Vadakkencherry, Palakkad
College_Summary: College of Applied Science is a college of education located at Vadakkencherry, Palakkad, Kerala, dedicating its services since 1993. The college is managed by the Institute of Human Resources Development (IHRD), Government of Kerala. It is affiliated to the University of Calicut, one of the top universities in India.

MIMS College of Allied Health Sciences Vazhayoor, Malappuram
College_Summary: MIMS College of Allied Health Sciences was established in the year 2008. The College offers B.Sc. and M.Sc. programme in numerous specializations. Admission in the course is based on merit. Candidates can apply to this College online.

College_Name: SAFI Institute of Advanced Study - [SIAS] Vazhayoor, Malappuram
College_Summary: SAFI Institute of Advanced Study is a private institute established in the year 2005 with a vast campus of more than 100 acres of land. It is recognized by the Kerala Govt. and affiliated to the University of Calicut. The institute offers 10 UG programs and 6 PG programs along with certificate and add-on courses. Students can apply for admission to merit quota or management quota. With an eco-friendly campus, the institute has excellent infrastructural facilities. There is a career guidance and placement cell for a bright career of students

College_Name: Silver Arts & Science College Perambra, Kozhikode
College_Summary: Silver Arts and Science College Perambra, Kozhikode, Kerala was established in the year 2010. The college provides education in various courses under the Arts and Science streams. The courses provided in the college include BA, MA, B. Com, M. Com, BCA, B. Sc. The admission to these courses is based on the merit of the previous qualifying exams. The application mode is offline.

Master of Arts [MA] (English Language and Literature)

College_Name: Sir Syed Institute for Technical Studies - [SSITS], Taliparamba
Sree Ayyappa College Eramallikkara, Chengannur
College_Summary: Sree Ayyappa College was established in the year 1995 and is affiliated to the University of Kerala. The College is accredited by NAAC and offers full-time UG and PG courses in numerous specializations. The admission in all the courses is purely based on rules stipulated by Kerala Government and University of Kerala. The application form can be collected either from the College office or filled via online mode.

College_Name: Sree Narayana College - [SNC], Vadakara
St. Mary's Women's College for Teacher Education, Tiruvalla
College_Summary: St Mary’s Women’s College for Teacher Education, Tiruvalla, Kerala was established in the year 2005. It college is recognized by the National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE) and is affiliated to Mahatma Gandhi University. It offers B.Ed across 7 specializations. Admission to the course is based on merit.

College_Name: Swamy Saswathikananda College Poothotta, Kochi
College_Summary: Swami Saswathikananda College was established in the year 2002. The college was established with the objective of providing job oriented courses to the students. S.S. College offers with various under graduate and post graduate programs in the field of science and commerce to the students of Ernakulam. It is affiliated to the M.G. University and is approved by the Kerala Government. The college has state of art infrastructure provided with all the vital and essential facilities for the staff members and the students. The faculty of the college is qualified and experienced in their field of expertise and imparts quality of education to the students of the college.

College_Name: Taliparamba Arts and Science college - [TASC] Kanhirangad, Kannur
College_Summary: Taliparamba Arts and Science College (TASC) is a private institution established in 2002 and founded by the Taliparamba Educational Co-operative Society. The college is affiliated to Kannur University and located on a charming 22 Acre of land in Kanhirangad, Kannur, Kerala.

College_Name: Thunchath Ezhuthachan College, Palakkad
Allama Iqbal Institute of Management - [AIIM], Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: AIIM was established in 2003, in a self-contained fully residential and picturesque campus in Daivappura at the foothills of Ponmudi. The Institute was founded by Iqbal College Trust in the year 1964. The Trust and its Educational Institutions are named after the great Patriot, Philosopher, and Educationalist, Sir Dr. Allama Mohammed Iqbal. AIIM is affiliated to the University of Kerala and approved by AICTE and Govt. of Kerala. The Institute is now rated as the 3rd best B-school and the 2nd best industry interfaced B-school in entire Kerala region. AIIM offers Master of Business Administration (MBA) program in several specializations to the candidates.

College_Name: Amrita School of Business - [ASB], Kochi
College_Summary: Amrita School of Business(ASB)is located in Kochi, Kerala. It is one of three campuses of Amrita School of Business established in 2009. This school of Business is running under Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham. This institution has been accredited ‘A’ by NAAC. ASB offers Postgraduate and Ph.D. programs in Management viz. Finance, HR, Marketing, Operations and Systems and Business Analytics.

College_Name: Amrita School of Business - [ASB] Amritapuri, Kollam
College_Summary: Amrita School of Business (ASB) is a multi-disciplinary research and teaching institute that is spread across 80 Acres of land of Kollam, Kerala. The Business school was set up in 2009 and is a part of the Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham Kollam, Kerala campus since then. The AICTE approved school offers Master of Business Administration (MBA) program in five specializations at the Postgraduate level.

College_Name: Bharata Mata Institute of Management - [BMIM], Kochi
College_Summary: Bharata Mata Institute of Management (BMIM) is situated in Thrikkakkara, within the Bharata Mata College campus. The institute is nationally accredited grade ‘A’  by NAAC. The co-educational management institute is managed by Bharata Mata Educational Trust and was established in the year 1965. BMIM offers a two-year full-time MBA program that is affiliated to M.G. University and approved by AICTE.

College_Name: Elijah Institute of Management Studies, Thrissur
Farook Institute of Management Studies - [FIMS], Calicut
College_Summary: Farook Institute of Management Studies (FIMS), Calicut is ranked 4th Best B-School in Kerala by Business Standard Magazine 2017 and ranked 5th Best Private B-school in Kerala by Business Today Magazine in 2017. The institute also ranked 7th Best B-school in Kerala by Higher Education Review Magazine in 2017. The college has been identified as a College with Potential for Excellence by the University Grants Commission. FIMS offers an MBA program in specializations like Marketing, Human Resources, and Finance.

College_Name: Holy Grace Academy of Management Studies - [HGAMS] Mala, Thrissur
College_Summary: Holy Grace Academy of Management Studies trains students to attain more gain in the field of management and related studies. It brings student in the same line of action as that of the developing market trends. The post graduate programme administered for Business Administration at Holy Grace Academy of Management Studies serves quite a lot of purposes where students stay bright and accommodative with the present scenario in market and trends. Besides the MBA programme some more add on professional courses are made available to spread across on an hourly management of education impartment. It includes-Retailing, SCM & Logistics, Mass Communication & Advertising Management, Aviation, Tourism & Cargo Management and Banking & Insurance. With the upcoming trend SAP ERP courses are even considered under the same belt with over 120 hours being devoted for the same.

In fact the MES has added one more feather of achievement in its cap with the establishment of this college. The college takes pride in being an integral part of such a reputed and diverse social organization. Having crystal clear visions to prepare potential teachers for contribution in the growth of India, the trainees are encouraged to develop unity in thought, actions and words. The college aims at moulding a world class team of professionals with skills and knowledge. Also, the college has a true commitment towards making highest possible efforts so that to make education a weapon for complete change.

College_Summary: Sahodaran Ayyappan Smaraka SNDP Yogam College is one of the oldest colleges in Konni, Pathanamthitta in the state of Kerala. It was established in the year 1995 and it is a co-educational institution. The college provides several undergraduate and postgraduate courses across various streams. Some of the popular courses offered by the College are BCom, BBA, and BCA.

College_Name: Santhigiri College, Thodupuzha
College_Summary: Established in the year 2016, The private college of Santhigiri College, Thodupuzha, Kerala caters to the Global Economy by creating Quality Business Managers and Entrepreneurs. SIM can be rendered as a rising star in the field of innovation and education as it provides several courses namely MBA, BBA, B.Com CA, B.Com Tax, M.Com, BCA, MCA, BA in Animation, and B.Sc Psychology. Not only this, the college gives its students an extra competitive edge in the industry by facilitating them with Additional advanced certificate courses like Microsoft Excel, Business English of Cambridge, Tally, Stock Trading, Counseling Skills, and Sales Management, Leadership Workshop SPSS, Retail Business, Personality Development. The college accepts CMAT and CAT Conducted by AICTE and IIMs respectively along with KMAT Kerala Conducted by ASC-Admission Supervisory Committee as entrance exams for students seeking admissions. The application mode is online.

College_Name: St. Cyril's College Adoor, Pathanamthitta
Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham Kochi Campus, Kochi
Central University of Kerala
College_Summary: Central University of Kerala (CUK) was founded in 2009 at Kasaragod, Kerala. It is ranked at #151 out of 200 top universities in the overall category by NIRF ranking 2022. The university offers UG, PG, Ph.D. and Diploma courses in the field of Science, Arts, Social Work, International Relations & Politics, English & Comparative Literature, Education, Linguistics, and Legal Studies. Admissions to the courses are based on CUET. University campus is spread over 310 acres of land with excellent infrastructural facilities.

College_Name: Darul Huda Islamic University - [DHIU], Malappuram
College_Summary: The institute was set up in 1986 as an Islamic Academy and upgraded to University in 2009. It has also received international recognition from the Al-Azhar University of Cairo in Egypt. The institute provides education from the secondary level up to the postgraduate level. Some diploma courses are also offered by the institute. There are 24 colleges under the university and a woman college is included in it. Admission in the secondary courses is done on the basis of a written and oral test.

College_Name: Kannur University
Kerala Kalamandalam Thrissur
College_Summary: Kerala Kalamandalam is a training center and conducts the performance of classical arts and was established by poet Vallathol Narayana Menon and Munkadaraja in 1930 in Thrissur, Kerala. It is a UGC recognized university offering Arts and Culture courses. The college provides BA, MA, M.Phil, and Ph.D. in the field of Cultural and Performing arts. Kerala Kalamandalam has Departments of Kathakali, Mohiniyattam, Kuttiyattam, Mridangam, Chenda, Karnatic Music, Malayalam, English, and Sanskrit.

College_Name: Kerala University
College_Summary: Kerala University is a state-level university, located in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala. Established in 1937 as the University of Travancore, it was one of the 16 universities in India and 1st in the state of Kerala. Kerala University is recognized by UGC and is the only university in Kerala that has been accredited by NAAC with the highest grade of A++. It is also ranked 24th among the top universities in India and 47th in overall category by NIRF 2023. Kerala University has 150 affiliated colleges,16 faculties, and 41 departments of teaching and research. Check Kerala University Affiliated Colleges

College_Name: KUHS
College_Summary: Kerala University of Health Sciences (KUHS) is a state-level medical university located in Thrissur, Kerala. KUHS is the first Health Sciences University in the state of Kerala established in the year 2010. It is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and the Medical Council of India (MCI). All the medical colleges and institutions imparting professional education in health care in Kerala are affiliated with KUHS.

College_Name: SSUS
College_Summary: Sree Sankaracharya University of Sanskrit (SSUS) is considered amongst the best Sanskrit Universities in India. It thrives to impart good knowledge in Sanskrit, other Indian as well as Foreign Languages, Fine Arts, and Social Sciences to the students. The university came into being in the year 1994 in Kalady, Kerala. It has 8 regional campuses in Kerala, most of which are located in rural areas. The University is recognised by UGC and accredited with an A Grade by NAAC.

College_Name: Seethi Sahib Memorial Polytechnic College - [SSMPTC], Malappuram
College_Summary: Seethi Sahib Memorial Polytechnic College, popularly known as SSM Polytechnic College, is one of the renowned technical colleges in India. SSM Polytechnic College is a government aided private institute, approved by AICTE and was established in 1962 by KMEA.

College_Name: Amala Institute of Medical Sciences
College_Summary: Established in 2005 at Thrissur in Kerala, Amala Institute of Medical Sciences often abbreviated to AIMS is one of the medical colleges of Kerala that provide quality education at under Graduation, Post-graduation, and doctoral levels. It offers more than 8 different courses with numerous specializations from 25 departments of medicine and surgery. Affiliated to the Kerala University of Health Science, the college promotes the “Home for total Healing” policy.

College_Name: Bishop Jerome Institute - [BJGI], Kollam
College_Summary: Bishop Jerome Institute or commonly known as BJGI Kollam Kerala is a private college that was established in the year 2011 by an education charitable trust which is formed by the Catholic Diocese of Quilon. Bishop Jerome Institute (BJGI) is an Engineering, Architecture, and Management institute that offers both undergraduate and postgraduate courses.

College_Name: Christ Knowledge City - [CKC], Ernakulam
College_Summary: Christ Knowledge City, Ernakulam, a Co-Ed Engineering College established in the year 2010 and is situated in Ernakulam in Kerala state of India. It is owned and managed by the Christ Educational Trust which is an Orthodox Christian Minority Private Trust. The Institute spreads over 18.5 acres of lush green and picturesque terrain, approved by AICTE and affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University of Kerala.

Mar Thoma College for Women Perumbavoor, Ernakulam
College_Summary: Mar Thoma College for Women located in Perumbavoor, Kerala was established in 1982. It is approved by UGC and is affiliated to MG University. At the UG level, the college offers B.Sc., B.Com, B.A and B.Voc across multiple specializations. At the PG level, the college offers M.Sc across two specializations. Admission to the college is based on merit and is conducted through MG University’s Centralized Admission Process.

College_Name: Institute of Human Resources Development - [IHRD], Thiruvananthapuram
Thunchath Ezhuthachan Malayalam University, Malappuram
College_Summary: Thunchath Ezhuthachan Malayalam University [TEMU], Kerala was established by the Government of Kerala in 2012. The University offers 3 courses i.e. MA, M.Phil and PhD across various fields with MA being their most popular program. The institute provides MA in Sociology, Linguistics and Malayalam (Literature, Creative Writing, and Cultural Heritage Studies), History, Film Studies. M.Phil course is designed as a preparatory course for PhD & other higher-level courses. The admission is based on the marks in the entrance and qualifying examination. The application mode is online.

College_Name: St. Joseph's College of Pharmacy (SJCP) Alappuzha
College_Summary: St. Joseph's College of Pharmacy (SJCP) is situated in Cherthala, Kerala. It is located in God’s own country among the pristine beauty of nature near Kumarakom, the famous touristy place where the National Aquatic Bird Sanctuary is located. This college is one of the units of the Nirmala Province of the Medical Sisters of St. Joseph (MSJ Dharmagiri) Aluva, Kerala which works for the medical healing of humankind from suffering devoid of the profit motive. Milad-E- Sherief Memorial College was founded with a vision of playing the key role in catering the socially backwards through enlightenment. In consonance with the vision of the founder, this shrine of letters looks forward to the heydays of a classless society.
